summary: A rough, uncompromising film about a washed-out prostitute going through the hardships of life on the margins of society.
cast: Meika Seri|Junko Miyashita|Genshû Hanayagi|Moeko Ezawa|Sakumi Hagiwara|Shiro Yumemura|Akira Okamoto|Akira Takahashi|Ikunosuke Koizumi|Hyôe Enoki|Nagatoshi Sakamoto|Kenji Shimamura|Kunio Shimizu|Saburô Shôji
title: (Maruhi) shikijô mesu ichiba
